other_tests.findings: Demonstrated a known discontinuity between the proximal pancreatic duct and the remainder of the pancreas, with extravasation of contrast suggesting ongoing leak.

Subhepatic fluid collection within the resection bed measures 4.6 x 3.1 cm, essentially unchanged from prior exam; central intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation is minimally decreased; pneumobilia persists and is unchanged; pancreatic stent has been removed with residual air within the pancreatic duct at the site of prior stent placement.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The subhepatic fluid collection remains unchanged compared to prior exam; central intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation is minimally decreased from prior.
